description:
Corset is the mayor of Daten City and the father of Scanty and Kneesocks. Corset is a demon with pale blue eyes, bony features, and a conical hairstyle. Like Garterbelt, he also has a fetish for bondage, but in a much more extreme way; he wears buckles on most of his body, mouth stretching hooks, and his namesake, a corset (he is often seen tightening them). Corset is Garterbelt`s counterpart and the two seem to have known each other prior to the story, referring to an "incident" as the last time they met. Both he and Garterbelt have a large X-shaped scar over their hearts. He seeks to obtain Hell`s Monkey, a mystical key that has the power to unlock Hell`s Gate and unleash the ultimate Ghost, as a part of his plan to take over Heaven and Earth.
Wikipedia
name: Corset
